exceptions.tactic: apply ctrl_a with (R := R) (S := S); auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X, Y, Z : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y TZ : reduction_t A Z R : relation2 X Y S : relation2 Y Z H : diagram_r TX R (EWeak TY) R H0 : diagram_r TY S (EWeak TZ) S The term "S" has type "Y -> Z -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "X -> Y -> Prop" (cannot unify "X" and "Y").

In environment A : Type H1 : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y) (B : relation X), controlled TX TY B -> forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) R) -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (comp (star B) R) (comp (star B) S) X, Y, Z : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y TZ : reduction_t A Z R : relation2 X Y S : relation2 Y Z H : diagram_r TX R (EWeak TY) R H0 : diagram_r TY S (EWeak TZ) S Unable to unify "controlled ?M2405 ?M2406 ?M2407" with "forall a : Lbl A, diagram (TX a) (comp R S) (EWeak TZ a) (comp R S)".

original: intros. unfold expansion1 in *. intros. apply ctrl_a with (R := R) (S := S); auto. apply mkctrl.
